column1: #Text=" Azula says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=I guess that 's why no one bothered to tell me about it !
#Text=You probably just were n't invited because it 's so obvious you 're supposed to be there .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , were you invited ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " And I 'm the prince !
#Text=" Azula says : " Exactly , so stop acting like a paranoid child !
